entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Request] Diagnostic IPC command to dynamically add startup hook at diagnostic startup suspension #83756
  • CoreCLR sample profiling seems expensive #83754
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] SimpleSourceChangeRebuildTest.SimpleStringChangeInSource - Long running test error, cannot access file used by another process #83752
  • Inefficient codegen with struct consisting of 2 SIMD vectors. #83749
  • Add error & status code info to System.Net.Http events #83734
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Reconsider how stress modes are randomly applied #83733
    Future
  • System.Buffers.Binary.Tests.BinaryReadAndWriteTests #83735
  • Could not load file or assembly 'mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0'...... in System.Resources.ResourceManager .NET6.0 #83730
  • JsonConsoleFormatter: (escaped) line breaks of exception stacktraces should be kept #83726
  • Deadlock in the Console.OutputEncoding setter #83723
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndRemove #83738
  • [API Proposal]: GC.RegisterObjectAssociatedMemory #83721
  • [API Proposal]: string System.IO.Path.ToPosixPortable(string) #83718
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on arm64 #83717
    Future
  • .Net 8.0 fails to resolve method in embedded DLL #83753
  • System.Reflection.Emit NuGet has empty `lib` folders for nominally supported frameworks #83710
  • `Buffer.Memmove` has unaligned casts #83709
  • RequiredAttribute does not validate null #83706

Closed

  • Generic struct including itself breaks the runtime - should be a compiler error? #43515
    Future
  • Questions about JsonSerializer.Deserialize #83704
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Floating Point Regression #83739
  • .Net 7-iOS: Why is the interpreter needed in .Net7 but not in Xamarin.iOS? #83442
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree->IsCall() || tree->OperIs(GT_COMMA)' during 'Stress gtSplitTree' #83576
    8.0.0
  • [6.0 & 7.0] Unexpectedly uncaught exception in Microsoft.VisualBasic FileSystem GetLongPath #81544
  • Distributed Transaction error/issue with .NET 7 #80777
  • [mono][llvm] Fully support .NET exceptions with LLVM on x64, x86, arm64, arm32 #63404
    8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Support nested EH clauses #54176
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83035
  • Array (single d, double d, and jagged) performance #83719
  • ARM64: Optimize redundant memory loads with mov #35141
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] link static System.Private.CoreLib.dll.a symbol not found #83460
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use an aka.ms link for the breaking change doc issue template #83757
    area-Meta
  • Provide support for exposing .NET classes to COM through source generation #83755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [browser] partial reversal of PR #82826 #83750
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [6.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83748
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83747
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Adjust Test Watcher Timeout for Test Collections #83746
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Cache files in simple server #83744
  • [release/7.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83743
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83742
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for arm64 #83740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove another reference field from async state machines #83737
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 8.0.0
  • Update owners and fabricbot #83732
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Disable more unsupported runtime tests #83731
  • [release/7.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83729
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83728
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [tvOS] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83727
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (3/3) IL Lowering & Outputting #83716
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (2/3) thunk & tramponlie #83715
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (1/3) lp64d ABI #83714
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add additional close statuses in ManagedWebSocket #83713
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • When the aggressive GCCollectionMode is specified, make sure the compacting parameter is set appropriately #83708
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP] RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Futher cleanups to delegate invocation #83705
    area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • Avoid losing messages for memory-mapped stress log #81038
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview3] Increment package version for net7 to 7.0.5 #83700
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump main pre-release version iteration to preview4 #83691
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Replace a load with cheaper mov instruction when possible #83458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] partial reversal of PR #82826 #83637
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter monitoring phase take 2 #83489
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83483
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add some barriers to the delegate invoke code. #83673
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Expand handling of non-value commas in gtSplitTree #83725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete Mono/RuntimeMarshal.cs #83678
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for constant lengths #83638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Load AOT module of a container assembly using assembly name #83711
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83510
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [mono][jit] Add vector horizontal sums and ToScalar on arm64. #83675
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [tvOS] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Adding compare all/any intrinsics. #83515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2140204 #83703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Correct documentation comment for IMultiplyOperators returns #83693
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove calling convention modifiers from cpuid sig #83672
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some HWIntrinsic logic to ensure the right gtType and simdSize are being set #83516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BitOperations::PopCount() in genCountBits() #83661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve RA for LowerBlockStore #83627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: tolerate malformed IL when counting block successors #83676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Eliminate commas early in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX support by default #83648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Correct formatting of config binder generator #83614
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add Symbolication to XUnitLogChecker #83702
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Persist FPU variables across try_compile passes #83206
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • Added floor and ceiling intrinsics for `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128` and `System.Numerics.Vector` #83592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Reduce size of async state machine by a reference field #83696
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, partner-impact
  • Add LinkerFlavor to NativeAOT #83558
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fix failing parallel tests #83687
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0] Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83574
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove EXTRA_*FLAGS. #82516
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • get rid of saved_allocated #77197
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64/X64 - Add `IsVNNeverNegative` #83694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • After auto-update VS cant find CrossGen target. #31356
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][Regression] Publishing blazorwasm project failed with error MSB3073: The command "embuilder.bat build MINIMAL" exited with code 1. #31330
  • dotnet test --no-build should fail when the target framework wasn't build #31326

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #31362
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Only enable scoped CSS when using Razor SDK #31359
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31343
    Area-Infrastructure
  • First pass at source build pre-built detection #31341
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • branding for preview4 #31322
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded to the current framework #31328
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Issue: 31133 backport pr 30762 to release/7.0.3xx: --platform #31319
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add AfterPublish target to ClickOnce target dependencies #31313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31302
  • Split WebAssembly SDK from Blazor SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't create duplicate output window categories #67429
  • [MAUI] Roslyn source generator is not run during .NET Hot Reload, triggers rude edit when x:Name is changed #67428
  • Investigate ways to potentially speed up ForAttributeWithMetadataName #67426
  • Test plan for "interceptors" #67421
  • Code fixes: `Folders` property is always empty for `Project.AdditionalDocuments` (C# analyzer additional files) #67414
  • All Quick Actions should have assignable shortcuts #67413
  • Add a C# code defragmenter? #67412
  • Update the class template to add the sealed modifier by default #67411
  • Crash when applying code fix to aspx file that is open in Visual Studio #67410
  • Add Explicit Return Type in C# #67409
  • Highlight references under cursor only if fully selected #67408
  • Display only methods of a particular scope #67407
  • please show typeinfo in document outline window when i open a c#file #67406
  • .NET app - Copy string unformatted / plain when debugging #67405
  • Formatting toolbar should work in code window #67404
  • Suggestions for setting 'var' preferences code style in C# editor #67403
  • Make code snippets use up-to-date syntax where applicable. #67402
  • Visual Basic Documentation Comments should minimize beside target, not above it. #67401
  • Formatting option to insert newline after file scoped namespace declarations #67400
  • Integrate `dotnet format` in Visual Studio #67399
  • Code Snippet for 'Debug.WriteLine()' in C# #67398
  • Inheritance margin should show language glyph for ambigous members as well #67397
  • Display inline parameter name hints bug #67395
  • Text Editor Format Selection disturbs non-selected line #67394
  • LSIF generator should be self-contained/self-bootstrapping #67389

Closed

  • Need to add support for `using unsafe static <Type>;` #67329
    C# 12.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add archived feeds #67430
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove abstract method that always returns the same value #67427
    Area-IDE
  • Do not use VS specific completion kinds in core LSP protocol layer #67419
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2140648 #67418
  • Enum base list completions #67396
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP #67392
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Add warning wave doc for 'taking address of local or parameter in async method' #67420
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Update feature status #67422
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Remove assert in CheckParameterValEscape() #67424
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67425
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Create a new solution folder for all things language-server related #67423
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Display exception filters by `BoundNode.DumpSource()` #67393
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify diagnostic check #67390
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix 17.5 CI build #67381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test #67387
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused state form TypeofBinder and GetTypeBinder. #67343
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers, Pending director approval, servicing-approved, 17.5
  • Port 66085 to 17.5 for servicing #67300
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval, servicing-approved
  • Reduce allocations in diagnostic analyzer management system. #67376
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix up local/non-local diagnostic classification in analyzer driver #67275
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch and resolve conflicts around primary constructors #67362
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Code changes to allow 'using static unsafe' #67344
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid applying partial changes when a code fix contains a mix of supported and unsupported actions #67262
    Area-IDE
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Exclude non-local diagnostics by default in legacy test framework for analyzer/code fix unit tests #67351
    Area-IDE
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Track state table removal due to input separately from removal due to selection #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AddHttpClient configuration action is never called #47357
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, mvc #47355
  • RDF/RDG inconsistency when resolving query/route parameters. #47353
    8.0-preview4
  • starting with V6+ the dll Microsoft.Extensions.ObjectPool will not load in Powershell #47352
  • IIS Express process memory size is not decreased. #47351
  • HttpRequestJsonExtensions ReadFromJsonAsync can only be used once #47350
  • Update gRPC JSON transcoding property priority #47349
    .NET 8 Planning
  • HealthCheckPublisherError and HealthCheckPublisherTimeout have the same EventId.Id = 104 #47348
  • RequestDelegateFactoryTests migration #47345
    8.0-preview4

Closed

  • Duplicate SegmentWriteStream #45957
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, https, plainTextWithFilter #47152
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47329
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #47330
  • How to move ClientApp from SPA Project to src/ (root folder) #47326
  • InvalidOperationException when using JwtBearerEvents.OnForbidden to customize response and multiple AuthenticationSchemes #33368
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Unable to use SpaProxy inside Codespaces #47299
    8.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Base path validation #47343
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc]The hyperlink for contents on NET 7.0.0 windows server hosting installer UI on loc OS is EN not loc link. #44613
    Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Fetch logic should check if the asset is present in the list of included assets before deciding to serve index.html #40678
    Backlog
  • [Blazor wasm/.NET 6/AAD] SignalR hub version negotiation fails with HTTP status 401 #47188
  • Unable to get KestrelEventSource event counters when application is hosted in IIS #47313
  • ASP.NET Core does not respect caching headers for images #47303
  • A very simple project to publish SignalR message to Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Redis #46958
  • Consolidate `FromBody` and `FromService` tests into shared test infra #47344
  • Output cache middleware throws when changing AllowCacheStorage on a later stage AND when AllowLocking = true. #47253
  • Asp.net core mvc read request body is very slow #47182
  • [API Proposal] Ability to monitor circuit activity #47325

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.4.23171.22 #47358
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix unobserved JSDisconnectedException in NavigationManager #47356
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0-preview3] Follow up 'Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity' #47354
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • WithOpenApi generates annotations for endpoints without MethodInfo #47346
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Move SegmentWriteStream to shared resource #47180
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Move a few RDG tests across to shared infrastructure. #47347
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Resolve InvalidOperationException inside HandleForbiddenAsync #47089
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Adding RedirectUrl option for SpaProxy #47300
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Update service worker templates to prevent index.html being served when an offline resource is requested. #47168
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Skip gRPC template tests on macos 11 until external bug is fixed #47337
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • Rename M.A.Http.Generators to M.A.Http.RequestDelegateGenerator #47334
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Handle Task/ValueTask.CompletedTask return in RDG #47211
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Follow up 'Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity' #47328
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Update branding to preview4 #47323
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
    pending-ci-rerun
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Fixed duplicate LoggerMessage EventNames in RemoteJSRuntime.cs file #47280
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • EnumTypeModelBinder does not handle enum flags provided as a list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor: System.IO.FileNotFoundException: '' on InitializeComponent() #14111
  • Upgrade WindowsAppSDK dependency version #14107
  • MAUI currently doesn't work if WindowsAppSdkDeploymentManagerInitialize is set to true #14105
  • [Windows] NVDA reading modes are not fully supported #14104
  • Keyboard Events Not Triggering in Input Element and InputText Component on macOS #14099
  • DisplayActionSheet still not working on Windows #14098
  • App.Current.PageDisappearing is not raised when a page is popped from the navigation stack. #14092
  • ScrollView inside Border does not render offscreen content after scroll. iOS only. #14091
  • MAUI app generated from template should be instantly compilable #14088
  • HorizontalOptions Fill does not have any effect on the HorizontalStackLayout #14087
  • Could not load file or assembly XmlSerializers.dll on Mac #14086

Closed

  • Maui Blazor with external library build in mac error #14056
  • RadioButton TextColor Doesnt work on iOS it is always black, works well on Android #13964
    Backlog
  • iOS Radio Button displays with same black coloring in Dark Mode #11747
  • MAUI Blazor: Referencing RCL to MAUI Blazor project triggers error on Android publishing #13961
  • [Windows] LineBreakMode doesn't work on Button #9277
    .NET 8 Planning
  • How to implement deep linking for iOS app on .Net MAUI? #14095
  • Changing properties of Shape.Stroke brush does not update app rendering #13891
    Backlog
  • App crash when FilePicker selects large files #6503
    Backlog
  • CollectionView within a CollectionView is very slow when loading items #7494
    Backlog
  • Maui.Essentials.Sample Codesign fails #13567

    Backlog
  • RadioButton ControlTemplate and Style issues #11819
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
  • [ios] fix memory leak with `Page` + `Layout` #14108
  • [net6.0] Updating Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools to 10.0.22621.756 #14106
  • Make KeyboardAutoManagerScroll Public #14103
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Fix iOS and Android versions #14102
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Do not scroll for UIAlertControllers #14100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [iOS] Don't apply mask to UIScrollView so the content doesn't get masked out #14096
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1587.40 to 1.0.1661.34 #14094
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus (#13908) #14067
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • Use a layout for MauiButton on Windows which supports LineBreakMode #14036
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Bump to .NET 8 Preview 3 builds #14081
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14084
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Invalidate shapes changing any property inside the brushes (Fill, Stroke) #13905
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix memory leak in VisualElement.Shadow #13960
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Blank image when Source set to null or on image loading error #14071
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Fix a couple life cycle scenarios on shell modals #14070
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [Windows] Fixed dupe items in ShellView #14069
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] fix memory leak in `Window` (#13400) #14073
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [core] WeakEventManager.RemoveEventHandler() should clear subscriptions #14074

Updated

  • Add TitleView to VisualChildren list for Page/Shell #14006

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sorting by a bigint / long in descending order times out on Linux, WSL, and MacOS #30544
  • Foreign Key relationships #30542
  • Owned type and inheritance issue #30541
  • Partial clearing of tracked entities #30540
  • ServiceProviderCreated never seems to get logged #30539
  • Can't reference navigations in custom aggregate function selector #30538

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.4.23171.22 #30543
  • Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30537

Merged

  • Remove most SQL parentheses for AND/OR #30525
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.32.1 to 3.32.2 #30536
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update branding to preview4 #30535

Updated

  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422
  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Clean n-1 SBRP packages after building SBRP #15898
